quickStartMarkdown: Write notes using Markdown with LaTeX math support.
quickStartInline: for inline math: wrap LaTeX in single dollar signs.
quickStartDisplay: for display math: wrap in double dollar signs.
quickStartSlash: Type <kbd>/command</kbd> then <kbd>Space</kbd> or <kbd>Tab</kbd> to expand LaTeX shortcuts. A popup will show matching commands as you type.
quickStartAutosave: Notes autosave after 30 seconds of inactivity, or press <kbd>Ctrl+S</kbd> to save immediately.
voiceMultiInputHelp: Say the keyword, then input values separated by "{{endInput}}". The last slot captures remaining text automatically.
noCustomCommands: No custom commands. Add your own below.
triggerWordHelp: Say "{{trigger}}" to start keyword mode, "{{endTrigger}}" to end. Text outside is plain prose. Misrecognition corrections apply only in keyword zones.
voiceDictationDesc: Click "Dictate" to speak. Recognized keywords are replaced with LaTeX or formatting automatically.
voiceDictationMultiInput: Multi-input: "summation i next n next" → \sum_{i}^{n}. The "next" phrase is configurable.
voiceDictationCustom: Configure all keywords via the "Voice" button — edit phrases or add custom keywords.
aiModeTooltip: AI interpretation mode — uses AI to convert natural speech to LaTeX
